data.author: Tim Dorr

changelog.release_notes:
- Metric support! (pulls from the in-car setting)
- Improved precision of the range value.
- Reordered the remote start and unlock menu items so they're next to each other.

- More verbose loading screen that indicates progress as it waits on Tesla's API.

During "Getting status..." the letters mean the following:
- V = vehicle state (vehicle name)
- C = charge state (rated miles and charging state)
- D = driving state (the car's location)

- Add original Pebble compatibility
- Tweak some of the loading process

More work is coming on the setup process. Make sure you visit the settings page from within the Pebble or Pebble Time app on your phone.

data.description:
Monitor and control your Tesla Model S from your wrist.

**IMPORTANT** Make sure you visit the settings from your Pebble or Pebble Time app first. The app won't work without it!

- Check your range and charge status
- Remember where you parked
- Forgot your key? Unlock and remote start.
- Too cold? Too hot? Turn on the AC or heat to prep your car.

Log in to your Tesla account via the Settings.

latest_release.release_notes:
